scripts.start: tamia server --lang en & npm run build:watch
scripts.start:ru: tamia server --lang ru & npm run build:watch
scripts.test: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:md
scripts.make-debug-symlinks: ln -s ../images public/en/images; ln -s ../build public/en/build; ln -s ../images public/ru/images; ln -s ../build public/ru/build;
